ygData.subject: Re: Back to the Ark/ Light our Darkest Hour.
ygData.msgSnippet: Tucson thoughtfully looks to Lord Elder with the same gentile expression he had held even when he was just a regular Autobot.  Being a Prime did not change who

Tucson thoughtfully looks to Lord Elder with the same gentile expression he=
 had held even when he was just a regular Autobot.  Being a Prime did not c=
hange who he was heartfully.  He gives Lord Elder's question a moment and t=
hen sits down to reply to him.

" I believe that if we try to attack the fo=
rtress full frontal, that will surely give us away.  It's what Hydras would=
 normally suspect of us.  What he won't suspect, is what Night Shift hopes =
to accomplish at the fortress by attempting to get a copy of the shell prog=
ram to us via remote transfer.  Once that's compelted, Night Shift will try=
 and make an excuse to leave the fortress to perform some recon duties for =
Hydras, and hopefully get Rodimus to join him.  I thought about this..  I k=
now we should try to rescue everyone all together but that would make it fa=
r too obvius.  We'll have to do this carefully.  We first lure Rodimus to u=
s, and once we do that, we'll need to get him quickly into stasis mode as s=
oon as we find a reversal for that shell program that Perceptor put on him.=
  Like I said, this could take time, and if we must spend the time to do so=
mething delicately, then so be it.  We want them to come to us, and not the=
 other way around.  We have a better chance at defeating them that way."

H=
e then gets up to watch the computer.

"After we rescue everyone, that is w=
hen we can carefully plan our next move.  The next objective will be more d=
ifficult than the first.  But right now, what's most important to us, is to=
 take back what was stolen from us.  Our comrades.  After that, we can thin=
k about subduing Hydras, Cyclonus and Scourge.  Things will fall into place=
 naturally.  Once the Decepticons who had been abandoned, realize that thei=
r leaders cast them asside for greed and power, they may just revolt agains=
t them.  This would further deduce the trio's hold over their faction.  Hop=
efully what may happen, is that we may even aquire new comrades.  It's as P=
rimus had said long ago... "Till all are one."  

He had recalled the story=
 of how Unicron had been defeated the first time.  

" It happened long ago=
, the first battle between Autobots, Decepticons and Unicron.  Unicron's gr=
eed for power almost lead to the demise of both Autobot and Decepticon kind=
, and it wasn't until both factions worked together as one, did Unicron get=
 defeated that first time.  That's what we need now.  We need to join our f=
orces and get everyone working together.  Autobot, Decepticon, Maximal and =
Predicon.  I have a feeling that Hydras really does not care for the well b=
eing of his fellow predacons, and is only using them for his personal gain.=
  Much like what Megatron and Galvatron did when they lead the Decepticons.=
  If he had cared for his minions, Nightstrike would have been rescued days=
 ago.  I understand he is still in Maximal custody.  This further confirms =
my suspicions.  So here it is, where we are now.  We're pulled apart once a=
gain, and in order to restore balance, we have to come together as one.  Ro=
dimus was very good at keeping the peace, and hopefully by recovering him f=
irst, I will have another Prime beside me to help fullfill that part of the=
 mission.  I understand that in order to light our darkest hour, I have to =
provide that light.  And provide it I will."

He looks to Kup and the other=
s.

" We all have to start somewhere.  It may not be where everyone expects=
.  But the smallest of changes can always lead to the best of results.  Kup=
, Elita, Lord Elder, guard the Ark.  I'm going to head over to the Maximal =
Base, and I'm going to talk to Nightstrike.  I think if we start gradually,=
 we'll get to where we need to be."

He opens the door to the outside, and =
transforms into a larger vehicle, with a sizeable trailer, looking a bit li=
ke a modern day truck.

"Inform me of Night Shift's progress as soon as he =
reports.  Keep safe my comrades."

He slowly rolls off the ramp, stopping a=
t the end, and signalling his next direction before rolling off to the Maxi=
mal base.  His speed is kept at a casual fifty five miles per hour.



--- =

 He turns back to his comrades.
> >
> > "Night Shift should be almost at th=
e Dark Fortress, hopefully he will send us the information we need to rever=
se the shell program which infects Rodimus and possibly Nightlight and Wind=
lord. It may take him some time to get it to us, but be prepared, it could =
happen sooner than later."
> 
> Lord Elder stood at first with his arms fol=
ded over his chest, when
> his jaw dropped and his arms dropped to his side=
s, "A New Prime!" he
> said in an awed whispered, his optics bright! "Maybe=
 we have a chance
> now against the Decepticons and the Unicronians!" Elder=
 as he stepped
> back a pace.
> 
> "What do we do now?" Elder said, ready t=
o relinquish his role in the
> Ark to one obviously of greater stature.
